      Throws:
      InvalidTokenException - If the token is not valid
      ExpiredTokenException - If the token is already expired.

    • recoverAccount

      Recover the users account
      Parameters:
      email -
      Throws:
      javax.security.auth.login.AccountNotFoundException - If the account doesn't exists!
      AccountRecoveryException - If the account is not been activated yet.

    • resendVerificationMail

      public void resendVerificationMail​(java.lang.String email) throws javax.security.auth.login.AccountNotFoundException, AccountExistsException
      Resend the verification mail if the user have not got any email to verify account.
      Parameters:
      email -
      Throws:
      javax.security.auth.login.AccountNotFoundException - if there isn't any account.
      AccountExistsException - if the account doesn't exists.
